Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Good news. Bucks run is up and running with excellent skate and classic. The golf course was also regroomed, but still no classic tracks there. Very windy so there is lots of debris in the tracks. Skaters reported excellent conditions. Note that on Monday and Tuesday Bucks will not be open until 2:00 so more snow can be spread. Please respect this closure so that we do not create conflict with the park staff. There’s still lots of other areas at the park to ski.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lots of snow ! Yesterday’s big groomer provided a firm flat skate deck . Today nature provided about 2 inches of fluff . Has to push a little bit , but it was very nice - and the sun came out . LF 7

nubsNob.xcTrails: All XC trails will be power-tilled and tracked today. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.comments: It is a cold and snowy Saturday at Nub's Nob. Conditions feel like the middle of winter. All of the Front and South Side runs are open today with the exception of the big terrain park. NASTAR racing begins today at 12:30 p.m. on Birch Run. The XC trails are being groomed this morning. The soup of the day is corn beef cabbage and there is a meatball sub special. Pintail Peak will open before next weekend! Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
